inlineContent.text: SwiftQL lets you write SQLite statements using Swift. SwiftQL aims to make SQL
a first-class dialect within Swift, with all of the benefits of compile-time
The aim of SwiftQL is to provide all of the functionality of standard SQLite in
Swift, while keeping in line with the style of Swift so that the code you
This brief overview shows some of the common use cases, then takes a deeper

abstract.text: SwiftQL lets you write SQL using familiar type-safe Swift.
